rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
[i]Protector of the Sacred Twins[/i] – This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land your opponents control.
[i]Silver Knight[/i] – When Seth, The Silver Knight enters, forge three times.
[i]Grado's Bane[/i] – Whenever an opponent casts a black, red, or blue spell, Seth deals 2 damage to that player.
